trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Myers
There were no other sightings in Fort Myers on or around March 31st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsOn tuesdat Mar. 31, 2009 my wifre and I were sitting on our front poarch at about 6:00 PM. We noticed the airplanes were taking off to the north east. While watching the planes fly over head we saw the object flying south east. It was still sunny outside at the time, it looked like a stasr coming at us, it waas shinny from the reflection of the sun. Then we thought it might be a sattelite visible during the daylight. It seemed very high in the sky, no contrail moving at at about the same speed as a sattelite. I think the ??? in the planes had ????? It was very noticeable. Tom Walter
